Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-41722 affecting package golang for versions less than 1.22.7-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-41722 affecting package golang for versions less than 1.22.7-2. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package golang is earlier than 1.22.7-2, affected by CVE-2022-41722
